name: James Lefevre
text: Great spot to get something when in a rush. The service is swift, prices are convenient, good atmosphere. I highly recommend this place

name: Elchele channel
text: the best pizza in LA fresh made in front of you :) i want more :) :)

name: Jak Khawk
text: Build your own pizza from the dough, to the sauce, and cheeses, along with everything and anything else you want on top? Yes! You want Blaze! Enjoyed getting my custom built pie here. The parking lot is ample and free, plenty of seating and …More

name: John Sarmiento
text: Good pizza a lot of options

name: Joseph Gonzalez
text: I love blaze because the service is always awesome, I'm personally lactose intolerant so pizza is basically impossible for me but blaze is the only place I've found that has a alternative cheese that I can eat. And on top of that being able to build your own pizza is cool. It's a nice change up from a basic pepperoni pizza.

name: Russell Wolfe
text: Would surely recommend trying this spot. Fantastic vibes, tasty food, great service. They never disappoint.

name: Marty Dunleavy
text: This visit was a birthday request from my very picky 12 year old.    So many different options and made exactly as you want it.   One of the best $10 meals around.

name: Weiss Schnee
text: Used drinkable lids, no straws.

name: Elizabeth Castorena
text: I used to come here all the time but 2 days ago my girlfriend and I went and we both got really sick afterwards. We're both assuming it was the dough because it looked and tasted different, but we assumed they knew what they were doing. I …More

name: Bertha Leon
text: The thin crust pizza here was pretty good and the deep dish pizza was good too.  Parking around the area is a hot mess but it's expected in the Mission.  As for service, we came as a group of around 10 (amazing we were all able to fit but …More

name: Gay Fraser
text: Great food overall & they offer options for us vegans - all very tasty! However the vegan pizza bread base needs some work - the pizza bread would not hold up the pizza ingredients in such a thin crust, so we had to eat our pizza w/forks …More

name: Michael Murillo
text: I really love that people can build their own pizza with the meats, sauces, cheeses, veggie toppings available for their own masterpiece entree they desire.

name: JJayKoi
text: An awesome meal of do it yourself pizza.  Various selection of toppings are available; and the process of flamed oven for cooking, your creation of thin crust pizza will leave a taste to remember.  A very helpful staff to serve you and …More

name: Aida Figgins
text: I love the deal $5 for 1/2 pizza. Whole meal w side salad (enough for two) for under $10 without a drink.

name: Granty Hall
text: One of our favorite pizza places. Super handy inside Del Amo mall. Busy on Fridays, but what do you expect with a quality pizza place?

name: Griffin G
text: Fast and delicious! Amazing fresh pizza!

name: Thomas Partida
text: I don’t know how people gravitate to this joint, I for once never cared for it but my daughter likes it so there.  Unfortunately this last experience was not so pleasant, the guy in charged of the oven was too busy shooting the breeze with …More

name: Pamela Portia Hyman-Dudang
text: The pizza took longer than 180 seconds that their menu claims the pizzas cook in. But my pizza was SCRUMPTIOUS!! I  I am so picky when it comes to make pizza this one in particular so good!  The next time I'm shopping at Del Amo Mall, I will definitely eat here again.

name: Sky Tesi
text: Pizza is good. The choice of toppings is good as well. I recommend the thin crust. Pairs well with Somisomi ice cream. Coming from New York - no pizza place can get a 5 star.

text: I like how they're crispy and hot yeah it's ok for a snack

text: You all are the worst location ever. I have left 5 voicemails with you all about not being able to pick up my order. No one has returned my calls, corporate won't answer my emails, you still charged my account. Highly disappointed and …More

name: William Christian
text: Blaze has good quality ingredients and generally good customer service! If you are in the mall and want pizza it's your best bet.

text: Incredibly fast and efficient service for a holiday. These guys are on top of it! Plus, the pizza is delicious. Thanks Mel and Adrian, you guys are the model of professionalism!

Blaze pizza is another one of those trendy build your own pizza places. The mall location is staffed with typical less than enthusiastic mall people.
